statements.sql: select * from `languages` where `default` = 1 limit 1
select * from `settings`
select `title`, `type`, `image` from `storefront_images`
select * from `setting_stores` limit 1
select * from `languages` order by `language_name` asc
select `currency_code` from `currency_rates`
select * from `users` where `id` = 1 and `users`.`deleted_at` is null limit 1
select count(*) as aggregate from `wishlists` where `user_id` = 1
select * from `categories` where `parent_id` is null and `categories`.`deleted_at` is null order by `is_active` desc, `id` asc
select * from `category_translations` where `category_translations`.`category_id` in (1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 8, 11, 14, 15) and `category_translations`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `categories` where `categories`.`parent_id` in (1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 8, 11, 14, 15) and `categories`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `category_translations` where `category_translations`.`category_id` in (9, 10, 12, 13, 70, 71) and `category_translations`.`deleted_at` is null

select `products`.*, `category_product`.`category_id` as `pivot_category_id`, `category_product`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `category_product` on `products`.`id` = `category_product`.`product_id` where `category_product`.`category_id` in (1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 8, 11, 14, 15) and `products`.`deleted_at` is null

select `products`.*, `category_product`.`category_id` as `pivot_category_id`, `category_product`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `category_product` on `products`.`id` = `category_product`.`product_id` where `category_product`.`category_id` = 9 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `categories` where `categories`.`parent_id` = 9 and `categories`.`parent_id` is not null and `categories`.`deleted_at` is null

select `products`.*, `category_product`.`category_id` as `pivot_category_id`, `category_product`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `category_product` on `products`.`id` = `category_product`.`product_id` where `category_product`.`category_id` = 10 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `categories` where `categories`.`parent_id` = 10 and `categories`.`parent_id` is not null and `categories`.`deleted_at` is null

select `products`.*, `category_product`.`category_id` as `pivot_category_id`, `category_product`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `category_product` on `products`.`id` = `category_product`.`product_id` where `category_product`.`category_id` = 12 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `categories` where `categories`.`parent_id` = 12 and `categories`.`parent_id` is not null and `categories`.`deleted_at` is null

select `products`.*, `category_product`.`category_id` as `pivot_category_id`, `category_product`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `category_product` on `products`.`id` = `category_product`.`product_id` where `category_product`.`category_id` = 13 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `categories` where `categories`.`parent_id` = 13 and `categories`.`parent_id` is not null and `categories`.`deleted_at` is null

select `products`.*, `category_product`.`category_id` as `pivot_category_id`, `category_product`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `category_product` on `products`.`id` = `category_product`.`product_id` where `category_product`.`category_id` = 70 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `categories` where `categories`.`parent_id` = 70 and `categories`.`parent_id` is not null and `categories`.`deleted_at` is null

select `products`.*, `category_product`.`category_id` as `pivot_category_id`, `category_product`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `category_product` on `products`.`id` = `category_product`.`product_id` where `category_product`.`category_id` = 71 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `categories` where `categories`.`parent_id` = 71 and `categories`.`parent_id` is not null and `categories`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `footer_descriptions` where `locale` = 'en' limit 1
select * from `setting_newsletters` limit 1

select `tags`.`slug`, `tag_translations`.`tag_name` from `tags` inner join `tag_translations` on `tags`.`id` = `tag_translations`.`tag_id` and (`tag_translations`.`local` = 'en' or `tag_translations`.`local` = 'en') where `tags`.`id` in ('1', '2', '3', '4', '7') and `tags`.`is_active` = 1 order by `tags`.`is_active` desc, `tags`.`id` desc
select * from `categories` where `slug` = 'mobile' and `categories`.`deleted_at` is null limit 1
select * from `category_product` where `category_product`.`category_id` in (1) limit 3
select * from `category_translations` where `locale` = 'en' and `category_translations`.`category_id` in (1) and `category_translations`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `category_translations` where `locale` = 'en' and `category_translations`.`category_id` in (1) and `category_translations`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `products` where `products`.`id` in (3, 4, 5) and `products`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `product_translations` where `local` = 'en' and `product_translations`.`product_id` in (3, 4, 5) and `product_translations`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `product_translations` where `local` = 'en' and `product_translations`.`product_id` in (3, 4, 5) and `product_translations`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `product_images` where `product_images`.`product_id` in (3, 4, 5)
select * from `product_images` where `product_images`.`product_id` in (3, 4, 5)
